text: I used to do skits for my mom... and I was always entertaining as a kid.
author: Leah Remini

text: They see me as being this Super Mom on TV who also can more than handle a difficult husband, and they assume I'm going to be just full of wisdom as a mother and wife myself.
author: Patricia Richardson

text: I took piano for many years. I kicked and screamed through all of my lessons, but my mom really insisted.
author: Kristin Kreuk

text: When I was 10 years old my mom used to play Tupac while she cleaned the house.
author: Soulja Boy

text: My dad died when I was three so my mom had to raise four kids on her own, and I think there's a part of me that pulls upon having watched my mom do that our whole lives. She had to make it work.
author: Leslie Bibb
